The System must keep an unalterable audit trail capable of automatically capturing and storing information.

The System must ensure that audit trail data is available for inspection on request, so that a specific event can be identified and all related data made accessible, and that this can be achieved by authorised external personnel who have little or no familiarity with the system.

The Clarus system shall be able to access in-situ environmental observations from data collectors.
The Clarus system shall accept environmental data derived from images.
The Clarus system shall be able to retrieve environmental data directly from environmental sensor stations.
The Clarus system shall accept environmental data from railroad vehicles.
The Clarus system shall accept environmental data from emergency vehicles.
The Clarus system shall detect out of range values.
The Clarus system shall be able to implement quality control rules for each environmental parameter.
The Clarus system shall be able to use multiple algorithms for its quality control process.
The Clarus system shall maintain a dynamic library of data for at least seven days.
The Clarus system shall record statistics about its operation.
The Clarus system shall acquire, process, and disseminate surface data.
The Clarus system shall accept only observations that include location, timeframe, and source metadata.
The Clarus system shall be able to communicate with environmental sensor stations using the NTCIP ESS 1204 standard for data collection.
The Clarus system shall employ industry standards to minimize implementation impact to users and providers.
The Clarus system shall enable environmental data queries by quality.
The Clarus system shall be able to be hosted at one or more physical locations.
The Clarus system shall disseminate data in response to polling.
The Clarus system shall be able to prioritize data handling for time-critical data.
The Clarus system shall be able to publish new data within twenty minutes of data receipt.
The Clarus system shall accept data only from approved sources.
The Clarus program shall provide network management tools.
The Clarus program shall define quality control rules for environmental observations.
The Clarus program shall maintain a comprehensive Clarus system test environment.
